basics.name: Nguyen Cong Tri
basics.label: AI Engineer
basics.summary: AI Engineer specializing in Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), Large Language Models (LLMs), Information Extraction, and Computer Vision. Experienced in building and deploying AI systems for healthcare, OCR, TinyML, face recognition, and anomaly detection.

courses: Thesis: Improving Warped Planar Object Detection Network For Automatic License Plate Recognition

publications.name: Improving Warped Planar Object Detection Network For Automatic License Plate Recognition
publications.summary: Thesis research on improving WPOD-Net for license plate recognition.
